meanings: weakness, weak point[spot, side], vulnerable point
make up for the weak points

vlive.korean: 뭐... 약점 잡힌 거 있어? Did your weakness get found out? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 놀리고싶은 후배가 생겼다 [프레쉬맨] EP05 인싸는 짜릿해
vlive.english: Did your weakness get found out?

vlive.korean: 아니면 뭐 약점이라도 잡혔니? Or does she know something that you don't want her to tell other people? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나를 괴롭히던 일진의 과거는? [일진에게 찍혔을 때] EP05
vlive.english: Or does she know something that you don't want her to tell other people?

vlive.korean: 저는 이제 이 사연에 정말 대답을 잘 못해드릴 수 있는 한 가지 약점이 있는데. I have a weakness that won't allow me to answer to this story. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] 뉴블의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.4
vlive.english: I have a weakness that won't allow me to answer to this story.

vlive.korean: 큰 약점이라고 하면... very weak at... 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.48 '최.배.찾' #prologue
저의 약점이 되어 주세요. Be my weakness. 듣기 View video INFINITE : 우현이 내게오나봐 잘사람자 라디오 5화

examples.korean: Take your weaknesses and translate them into positives. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자신의 약점을 잡아내어 그것들을 긍정적인 것으로 바꾸어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Take your weaknesses and translate them into positives. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The team’s weak points are in defence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 팀의 약점은 방어이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The team’s weak points are in defence. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Can you spot the weakness in her argument? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 주장에 담긴 약점을 찾아낼 수 있겠어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can you spot the weakness in her argument? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He knew her weak spot where Steve was concerned. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 스티브와 관련된 그녀의 약점을 알고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He knew her weak spot where Steve was concerned. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The fact that I was a foreigner was a big disadvantage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 외국인이라는 사실이 큰 약점이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The fact that I was a foreigner was a big disadvantage. Add to Wordbook
